title: Proud 2 Be Me!

abstract: Winner - Bullying. No Way! Primary Award. A story of a little, white monster who feels like he doesn't belong.
description: A story of a little, white monster who feels like he doesn't belong. He tries to make himself fit in, which doesn't quite work out. The other little monsters finally decide that they like the little white monster just the way he is.  Under the category 'Bullying. No Way! - Primary', Years 5 and 6, St Luke's Primary School, Victoria, were the Screen It 2012 winners.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002642; 'Screen It' 2012 [winning entries]; Active; 2012
